properties.help:
Display an image in an independant window. The image can optionnaly be scaled to improve visualization.
Parameters: - window name (string): the title of the window where the image will be displayed. - scaling (string): one of the following scaling method: -- None: no scaling is done, the image is displayed as it is. -- Auto: the image is scaled between its min and max pixel values. -- Manual: the image is scaled between min and max values given by the user. - scaling min (float): min value used for scaling if scaling method is 'Manual'. - scaling max (float): max value used for scaling if scaling method is 'Manual'.
Inputs/Outputs: - input1: image to be displayed.
properties.label: Show image
properties.processings: showImage( "_PARAM1_ (ESC to stop, SPACE to pause)", "_SCALING_", _SCALINGMIN_, _SCALINGMAX_, _INPUT1_);
